Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Expands the definition of a qualified post production facility to include certain services performed outside the state
Summary: Expands the definition of a qualified post production facility to include certain services performed outside the state when such services are on behalf of a project contracted with a qualified post production facility and whose projects are taxable by the state.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to expanding the definition of a qualified post production facility to include certain services performed outside the state
